public class DirectionsFetcher

The DirectionsFetcher class fetches directions from the RapidRider server.

Constructor Detail

DirectionsFetcher

public DirectionsFetcher(DisplayScreen _screen)
Constructs a directions fetcher. It uses the given screen to get the destination and current location when it is time to fetch directions.
